option.name: fileSummaryMaps
option.value: {"C:/Users/HuanTech PC/IdeaProjects/EXCEL_3BC_TORIAI":"{\"/src/main/java/com/lenha/excel_3bc_toriai/model/Setup.java\":\"This file contains a single class named `Setup` that represents the configuration settings for an application.\\n\\n`Setup`: A class that holds the configuration settings for the application, including the file paths for the Excel file, the 3BC Toriai file, and the directories to save the files.\\n\\n`getLinkExcelFile()`: Returns the file path for the Excel file.\\n`setLinkExcelFile(String linkExcelFile)`: Sets the file path for the Excel file.\\n`getLink3bcToriaiFile()`: Returns the file path for the 3BC Toriai file.\\n`setLink3bcToriaiFile(String link3bcToriaiFile)`: Sets the file path for the 3BC Toriai file.\\n`getLang()`: Returns the language setting.\\n`setLang(String lang)`: Sets the language setting.\\n`getLinkSave3BCFileDir()`: Returns the directory path to save the 3BC Toriai file.\\n`getLinkSaveExcelFileDir()`: Returns the directory path to save the Excel file.\\n`setLinkSave3BCFileDir(String linkSave3BCFileDir)`: Sets the directory path to save the 3BC Toriai file.\\n`setLinkSaveExcelFileDir(String linkSaveExcelFileDir)`: Sets the directory path to save the Excel file.\",\"/src/main/java/com/lenha/excel_3bc_toriai/ConVertExcelAnd3BCController.java\":\"This file is a JavaFX controller class that handles the conversion of Excel files to 3BC files and the conversion of PDF files to Excel files. It also provides functionality for setting up the file and directory paths, managing language settings, and displaying the converted files in a ListView.\\n\\n`ConVertExcelAnd3BCController`: This class is the main controller for the application, handling all the user interactions and file processing logic.\\n\\n`getExcelFile()`: This function allows the user to select an Excel file for processing.\\n\\n`get3bcToriaiFile()`: This function allows the user to select a PDF file for processing.\\n\\n`setSave3bcFileDir()`: This function allows the user to select a directory to save the 3BC files.\\n\\n`setSaveExcelFileDir()`: This function allows the user to select a directory to save the Excel files.\\n\\n`convertFilePdfToriaiToExcel()`: This function handles the conversion of PDF files to Excel files.\\n\\n`convertExcelTo3bcFile()`: This function handles the conversion of Excel files to 3BC files.\\n\\n`updateLangInBackground()`: This function updates the language of the UI controls in the background.\\n\\n`updateLang()`: This function updates the language of the UI controls.\\n\\n`copyContentToClipBoard()`: This function copies the content to the system clipboard.\\n\\n`setupCellChlFIleList()`: This function sets up the formatting of the cells in the ListView.\\n\\n`closeApp()`: This function closes the application.\\n\\n`openAbout()`: This function opens an \\\"About\\\" dialog for the application.\",\"/src/main/java/com/lenha/excel_3bc_toriai/model/ExcelFile.java\":\"This file contains a single class, `ExcelFile`, which represents an Excel file with specific properties.\\n\\n`ExcelFile`: A class that represents an Excel file with a name, a kouSyuName, and two double values representing the kouzaiChouGoukei and seiHinChouGoukei.\\n\\n`getKouSyuName()`: Returns the kouSyuName of the ExcelFile.\\n`setKouSyuName(String kouSyuName)`: Sets the kouSyuName of the ExcelFile.\\n`ExcelFile(String name, String kouSyuName, double kouzaiChouGoukei, double seiHinChouGoukei)`: Constructs an ExcelFile object with the given parameters.\\n`getName()`: Returns the name of the ExcelFile.\\n`setName(String name)`: Sets the name of the ExcelFile.\\n`getKouzaiChouGoukei()`: Returns the kouzaiChouGoukei of the ExcelFile.\\n`getSeiHinChouGoukei()`: Returns the seiHinChouGoukei of the ExcelFile.\\n`toString()`: Returns the name of the ExcelFile as a string.\",\"/src/main/java/com/lenha/excel_3bc_toriai/AboutController.java\":\"This file contains a single class `AboutController` and several functions within it.\\n\\n`AboutController`: This class handles the logic and UI elements of an \\\"About\\\" dialog window in a JavaFX application.\\n\\n`okAbout(ActionEvent actionEvent)`: This function handles the event when the user clicks the \\\"OK\\\" button to close the \\\"About\\\" dialog.\\n\\n`init(ConVertExcelAnd3BCController conVertPdfToExcelCHLController, Dialog\\u003cObject\\u003e dialog)`: This function initializes the \\\"About\\\" dialog, sets up the close button functionality, and adds the UI elements to a list to be used for language updates.\",\"/src/main/java/com/lenha/excel_3bc_toriai/dao/SetupData.java\":\"This file contains a single class `SetupData` that manages the setup data for the application. It includes the following functions:\\n\\n`SetupData()`: Initializes the `SetupData` class and sets up the language map, default file paths, and creates the necessary directories and files.\\n\\n`getInstance()`: Returns the singleton instance of the `SetupData` class.\\n\\n`getControls()`: Returns the list of UI controls that need to be updated when the language changes.\\n\\n`getSetup()`: Returns the `Setup` object that contains the application settings.\\n\\n`setLinkExcelFile(String linkExcelFile)`: Sets the link to the Excel file in the `Setup` object and saves the changes to the setup file.\\n\\n`setLink3bcToriaiFile(String link3bcToriaiFile)`: Sets the link to the 3BC Toriai file in the `Setup` object and saves the changes to the setup file.\\n\\n`setLinkSave3bcFileDir(String save3bcFileDir)`: Sets the link to the directory where the 3BC files will be saved in the `Setup` object and saves the changes to the setup file.\\n\\n`setLinkSaveExcelFileDir(String saveExcelFileDir)`: Sets the link to the directory where the Excel files will be saved in the `Setup` object and saves the changes to the setup file.\\n\\n`setLang(String lang)`: Sets the language in the `Setup` object and saves the changes to the setup file.\\n\\n`getExcelFiles()`: Returns the list of Excel files that have been created.\\n\\n`getLanguageMap()`: Returns the map of language strings and their corresponding keys.\\n\\n`loadSetup()`: Loads the setup data from the setup file and updates the `Setup` object.\\n\\n`saveSetup()`: Saves the current setup data to the setup file.\\n\\n`createDirAndFile()`: Creates the necessary directories and files if they don\\u0027t already exist.\",\"/src/main/java/com/lenha/excel_3bc_toriai/MainApplication.java\":\"This file is the main application class for a JavaFX application that allows users to convert between Excel and 3BC files. It sets up the application\\u0027s main stage, loads the FXML file, and initializes the application\\u0027s setup data.\\n\\n`MainApplication`: The main application class that extends the JavaFX `Application` class.\\n\\n`start(Stage stage)`: Loads the FXML file, sets the application\\u0027s icon, title, and scene, and adds the stage to the controller\\u0027s list of controls.\\n\\n`init()`: Loads the application\\u0027s setup data from a file.\\n\\n`main(String[] args)`: The main entry point for the application, which launches the application.\",\"/src/main/java/com/lenha/excel_3bc_toriai/convert/excelTo3bc/ReadExcel.java\":\"This file contains a single class `ReadExcel` and several functions within it. The purpose of this file is to read data from an Excel file and extract relevant information such as material codes, specific weights, and product dimensions and quantities.\\n\\n`ReadExcel`: This class is responsible for reading and processing the data from an Excel file.\\n\\n`readExcel(String fileExcelPath, ObservableList\\u003cMap\\u003cString[], Map\\u003cDouble, Integer\\u003e\\u003e\\u003e toriaiSheets)`: This function reads the Excel file, extracts the material codes, specific weights, and product information, and stores them in the provided `toriaiSheets` list.\\n\\n`convertKousyuAndKhoiLuongRiengExcelTo3bc(String kousyu, double khoiLuongRieng, String[] kousyuVaKhoiLuongRiengArr)`: This function converts the material code and specific weight from the Excel format to the format required for the 3bc system.\\n\\n`getStringCellValue(Cell cell)`: This function retrieves the value of a cell in the Excel file, handling different cell types.\\n\\n`getLastRowWithDataInColumn(Sheet sheet, int columnIndex)`: This function finds the last row in a sheet that contains data in the specified column.\",\"/src/main/java/module-info.java\":\"This file appears to be a module declaration for a Java project that converts PDF files to Excel format. It does not contain any classes or functions, but rather specifies the dependencies and packages used in the project.\\n\\nThe module declaration includes the following requirements:\\n\\n`javafx.controls`: Provides the JavaFX controls for the user interface.\\n`javafx.fxml`: Provides the JavaFX FXML support for the user interface.\\n`com.opencsv`: Provides the OpenCSV library for reading and writing CSV files.\\n`org.apache.pdfbox`: Provides the Apache PDFBox library for working with PDF files.\\n`org.apache.poi.poi`: Provides the Apache POI library for working with Microsoft Office documents, including Excel.\\n`org.apache.poi.ooxml`: Provides the Apache POI OOXML library for working with the latest Microsoft Office document formats.\\n`java.desktop`: Provides the Java Desktop API for interacting with the operating system.\\n\\nThe `opens` and `exports` statements in the module declaration indicate that the `com.lenha.excel_3bc_toriai` package is accessible to the JavaFX FXML system and can be exported for use by other modules.\",\"/src/main/java/com/lenha/excel_3bc_toriai/test/ZipEditor.java\":\"This file does not contain any classes. It contains the following functions:\\n\\n`main`: The main function that reads a sample ZIP file, modifies a specific file within the ZIP, and writes the modified ZIP file to the same location.\\n\\n`ZipEditor`: This file is a utility class that provides functionality to edit a specific file within a ZIP archive and save the modified ZIP file.\\n\\nIn summary, this file is a Java program that reads a ZIP file, modifies a specific file within the ZIP, and writes the modified ZIP file to the same location.\",\"/src/main/java/com/lenha/excel_3bc_toriai/Main.java\":\"This file contains a single class and one function:\\n\\n`Main`: This class serves as the entry point for the application, calling the `main()` method of the `MainApplication` class.\\n\\n`main(String[] args)`: This function is the main entry point of the application, which calls the `main()` method of the `MainApplication` class.\",\"/src/main/java/com/lenha/excel_3bc_toriai/convert/excelTo3bc/Write3BC.java\":\"This file contains a single class and one function:\\n\\n`Write3BC`: A class that provides a method to write 3BC files.\\n\\n`write3BC`: A function that sets the directory path for 3BC files.\\n\\nThe purpose of this file is to provide a way to write 3BC files by setting the directory path where the 3BC files will be stored.\",\"/src/main/java/com/lenha/excel_3bc_toriai/convert/ExcelTo3BC.java\":\"This file contains the `ExcelTo3BC` class, which is responsible for converting an Excel file to a 3BC file.\\n\\n`ExcelTo3BC`: This class is responsible for converting an Excel file to a 3BC file.\\n\\n`convertExcelTo3bc`: This function reads the Excel file, processes the data, and writes the 3BC file.\",\"/src/main/java/com/lenha/excel_3bc_toriai/convert/ReadPDFToExcel.java\":\"This file contains a single class `ReadPDFToExcel` that provides functionality to convert a PDF file containing material calculations into Excel files (both XLSX and CSV formats) and CHL files (a specific file format).\\n\\n`convertPDFToExcel`: Converts a PDF file into multiple Excel and CHL files, each representing a different material type.\\n\\n`getFullToriaiText`: Extracts the full text content from the PDF file and splits it into individual pages, each containing information about a specific material type.\\n\\n`getHeaderData`: Extracts header information, such as the customer name, date, and project name, from the first page of the PDF file.\\n\\n`getKouSyu`: Extracts the material type, size, and other relevant information from the PDF file.\\n\\n`getToriaiData`: Analyzes the material calculation data in the PDF file and organizes it into a data structure for further processing.\\n\\n`divFile`: Divides the material calculation data into multiple files if the number of rows exceeds a certain limit.\\n\\n`writeDataToExcel`: Writes the material calculation data to an Excel file in XLSX format.\\n\\n`writeDataToCSV`: Writes the material calculation data to an Excel file in CSV format.\\n\\n`writeDataToChl`: Writes the material calculation data to a CHL file in a specific format.\\n\\n`extractValue`: Extracts a value from a given text based on start and end delimiters.\\n\\n`convertStringToIntAndMul`: Converts a string to a BigDecimal, multiplies it by a given factor, and returns the result as an integer.\"}"}
